title: I'm trying to get over the fact this is happening pretty often.
body:
https://41.media.tumblr.com/9cf2306159a6e2809693f076c2bf8759/tumblr_nooj83r5ui1r183lzo1_540.jpg

Maybe informing the public more will prevent this from happening?

Kind of unsettling, to be honest, hearing tortoises being drowned because people can't tell that it's not a turtle, and there's the fact people have the DESIRE to pick one up and throw it in a lake, I mean I guess people can't imagine what that would feel like, knowing where you're going and then suddenly someone throws you in a lake and you have to go put more effort into getting back to where you were, or more seriously, being thrown into a lake, knowing your drowning, and knowing no one is going to save you.
